# Onboarding Wizard Recording Transcripts

Use these summaries when the instructions mention reviewing the step recordings.

## Step 1 · Welcome + Team Naming (00:00–01:20)
- Screen shows welcome headline, optional product tour video toggle, and team name input.
- Voice-over notes the focus jumps between the video card and the text field twice.
- Cursor hesitates 6 seconds before discovering the "Skip tour" text link.
- Error toast appears in top-right when the team name exceeds 24 characters.

## Step 2 · Permissions (01:20–03:10)
- Modal overlays forcing role assignments (Admin, Creator, Viewer) before proceeding.
- Tooltip uses "ACL" acronym without explanation; testers pause to ask for clarification.
- Screen reader narration repeats the entire modal title after every selection.
- Saving triggers spinner that lasts 8 seconds before revealing an error banner.

## Step 3 · Tutorial Preferences (03:10–04:15)
- Checklist asks users to opt into advanced automation features by default.
- Inline video auto-plays with audio at 75% volume.
- Progress indicator remains at 50% even after completing the checklist.
- Success state only displays in green without icon or text confirmation.
